plum.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a small round juicy fruit which is dark red, purple, or yellow and has a single hard seed, or the tree that produces this fruit
plum.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: something very good that other people wish they had, such as a good job or a part in a play
plum.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: The first job I had was a real plum.
